gobblin.data.management.retention.policy

Interface RetentionPolicy<T extends DatasetVersion>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - DatasetVersion accepted by this policy.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombineRetentionPolicy, DeleteAllRetentionPolicy, DeleteNothingRetentionPolicy, NewestKRetentionPolicy, PredicateRetentionPolicy, RawDatasetRetentionPolicy, TimeBasedRetentionPolicy

    public interface RetentionPolicy<T extends DatasetVersion>
    Retention policy around versions of a dataset. Specifies which versions of a dataset should be deleted by DatasetCleaner.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<T> listDeletableVersions(List<T> allVersions)
      Deprecated. 
      use {link gobblin.data.management.policy.VersionSelectionPolicy#listSelectedVersions} instead. Logic to decide which dataset versions should be deleted. Only datasets returned will be deleted from filesystem.
      Class<? extends DatasetVersion> versionClass()
      Should return class of T.

    • Method Detail

      • versionClass

        Class<? extends DatasetVersion> versionClass()
        Should return class of T.
        Returns:
        class of T.

      • listDeletableVersions

        @Deprecated
Collection<T> listDeletableVersions(List<T> allVersions)
        Deprecated. use {link gobblin.data.management.policy.VersionSelectionPolicy#listSelectedVersions} instead. Logic to decide which dataset versions should be deleted. Only datasets returned will be deleted from filesystem.
        Parameters:
        allVersions - List of all dataset versions in the file system, sorted from newest to oldest.
        Returns:
        Collection of dataset versions that should be deleted.
